One of the best spot in cebu city.  If you want to experience the wonders of nature without going far from cebu city, this place is a great option. Good for tricking and mountain climbing.  For just less than 200php expenses on fair,  just bring your own food for convenience.
A good destination to cool down during summer. Accessible via Budlaan, Sirao, or Malubog. Takes about an hour walk from either barangay. Also a perfect place for trail running.
